definition: incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb

sentences.english: We declare him anathematized and excommunicated and we judge him condemned to eternal fire.
sentences.chinese: 我們宣告他被詛咒及驅逐出教，並斷定他不得永生。

sentences.english: When we are cursing about the viciousness of the snake, we are actually pleased about its existence.
sentences.chinese: 我們在詛咒蛇的惡毒的同時卻又在慶幸它的存在。

sentences.english: Description: This is the reductor curse, it will blast apart a solid object.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個消滅還原詛咒，可以把一個固體物件炸開。

sentences.english: Balak the king of Moab summons Balaam to curse the people of God.
sentences.chinese: 摩押王巴勒命令巴蘭詛咒上帝的子民。

sentences.english: Abundant church-creation is a blessing and a curse for the house-church movement, too.
sentences.chinese: 對於家庭教會來說，大量組織湧現是祝福也是詛咒。

sentences.english: It also involves howls of exasperation cursing and gnashing of teeth.
sentences.chinese: 還包括憤激的狂笑詛咒和咬牙切齒。

sentences.english: And his cursed soul was cast into the viles of Hades…
sentences.chinese: 他那被詛咒的靈魂墜入了哈迪斯的深淵。

sentences.english: Better to light one candle than to curse the dark-ness.
sentences.chinese: 與其詛咒黑暗，毋如燃起蠟燭。

sentences.english: Whoever is so confident to clarify whether this era is to be lauded or cursed?
sentences.chinese: 這個時代是該被讚美還是被詛咒，誰自認能說得清呢？

sentences.english: He who speaks against the truth of apostolical pardons, let him be anathema and accursed.
sentences.chinese: 他對誰講的真理使徒的赦免，讓他被詛咒和詛咒。

sentences.english: He who speaks against the truth of apostolical pardons, let him be anathema and accursed.
sentences.chinese: 他對誰講的真理使徒的赦免，讓他被詛咒和詛咒。

sentences.english: And look upon my self and curse my fate.
sentences.chinese: 顧盼着身影，詛咒自己的生辰。

sentences.english: A light purse is a heavy curse .
sentences.chinese: 小金庫好比一個巨大的詛咒。

sentences.english: The seed vitality, sing songs from the poor not curse.
sentences.chinese: 生命力頑強的種子，從不對瘠土唱詛咒的歌。

sentences.english: Thy very children curse thee to thy face (William Cowper).
sentences.chinese: 你親生的兒女們竟公開詛咒你。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
